headline: The report, titled “On the Right Track?” provides an overview of the forces driving monitoring and evaluation in the sector, the practical decisions made by humanitarian organisations when implementing systems and their effect on the quality and use of the information generated. The report also highlights the growing number of indicators used by humanitarian organisations, and the challenges for comparative analysis posed by such diversity.
title: On the right track? - A brief review of monitoring and evaluation in the humanitarian sector
